translation.en: [narrator] Hollywood, California. Tinseltown is boomtown.
translation.it: Hollywood, California. Tinseltown è in crescita.

translation.en: During the war, Los Angeles grew as a hub of wartime industry,
translation.it: Durante la guerra, Los Angeles divenne il fulcro dell'industria bellica,

translation.en: producing all manner of aircraft and ammunition
to support our fighting men overseas.
translation.it: per sostenere i nostri soldati oltreoceano.

translation.en: The war now over,
many of these starry-eyed dreamers hope to make it in moving pictures,
translation.it: e molti di questi sognatori sperano di sfondare nel cinema.

translation.en: swarming like so many locusts outside the studio gates,
translation.it: Sciamano come locuste fuori dai cancelli dello studio,

translation.en: hoping to score a role as an extra
translation.it: sperando di ottenere un ruolo da comparsa

translation.en: and become the next Paul Muni or Hedy Lamarr.
translation.it: e di diventare il prossimo Paul Muni o Hedy Lamarr.

translation.en: The studio system is king,
and if you make all the right moves, you too could be living in Beverly Hills,
translation.it: e se fai le mosse giuste, anche tu potresti vivere a Beverly Hills,

translation.en: splashing in your private pool with invitations to all the right parties.
translation.it: con tanto di piscina privata e inviti alle feste migliori.

translation.en: You might even become immortalized at Grauman's Chinese Theatre.
translation.it: Potresti anche essere immortalato al Grauman's Chinese Theatre.

translation.en: The rewards for ambition are bountiful here
translation.it: Le ricompense per gli ambiziosi non mancano,

translation.en: in the beautiful Southern California sun.
translation.it: sotto il bellissimo sole della California del Sud.

translation.en: [man] Pardon me. Beg your pardon.
Sorry, excuse me.
Excuse me, pardon me.
Excuse me, coming through. Sorry.
translation.it: Devo passare. Mi scusi. Ciao, Lou!

translation.en: -Hiya, Lou! -Hey, Jackie. Get over here, kid.
translation.it: Mi scusi. Ciao, Lou! Ehi, Jackie. Vieni qui.

translation.en: -Say, what time'd you get here? -About an hour ago,
translation.it: Quando sei arrivato? - Un'oretta fa. Chi prima arriva... - Chiaro.

translation.en: -early birds getting worms and such. -Sure.
translation.it: - Un'oretta fa. Chi prima arriva... - Chiaro.

translation.en: They're still lensing the John Farrow picture with Alan Ladd and Donna Reed.
translation.it: Stanno ancora girando il film di Farrow con Alan Ladd e Donna Reed.

translation.en: -"Lensing"? -Lensing.
It's how you say "filmmaking" in Hollywood-ese. You gotta learn the lingo.
translation.it: È così che si dice "filmare" a Hollywood. Devi imparare il gergo.

translation.en: Billy Wilder is helming a picture with Emperor Franz--
translation.it: Billy Wilder guida un film sull'imperatore austriaco.

translation.en: -"Helming"? -Directing.
Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine, it's gonna be boffo BO.
translation.it: Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine... Sbancherà il botteghino.

translation.en: And she thinks we're gonna start the day on the big ballroom scene.
translation.it: Lei pensa che inizieremo le riprese nel salone da ballo.

translation.en: Lots of extras. People standing by the punch bowl,
translation.it: Tante comparse. Gente in piedi accanto al bar,

translation.en: folks crossing the hallway when they enter the big door.
translation.it: gente che attraversa il corridoio quando entrano...

translation.en: I think I got a real shot at that one.
What about a western or war picture? Something like that.
translation.it: E un western o un film di guerra, magari?

translation.en: They making any of those?
You don't say "making a movie," Jack. You produce a movie, "produce."
translation.it: Non si dice "fare un film". Un film si "produce".

translation.en: You gotta know this stuff if you wanna make it big time.
translation.it: Devi sapere queste cose, se vuoi farcela.

translation.en: Shh, shh, shh! Here she comes, the old gorgon herself.
translation.it: Ecco che arriva la vecchia gorgone.

translation.en: Okay, listen up. I'm only gonna say this once.
translation.it: Ascoltate bene. Lo dirò una volta sola.

translation.en: Rule number one, do not look at the camera.
translation.it: Regola numero uno: non guardare la cinepresa.

translation.en: Rule number two, do not talk to the director.
translation.it: Regola numero due, non parlare al regista.

translation.en: In fact, a good rule of thumb is to not talk at all.
translation.it: Anzi, sarebbe buona norma non parlare affatto.

translation.en: Rule number three, if you see a platter of food on the sound stage, do not eat it.
translation.it: Regola numero tre: se vedete del cibo in studio, non mangiatelo.

translation.en: That is not for you. That is for the actors and the crew.
translation.it: Non è per voi, ma per gli attori e la troupe.

translation.en: If you see food on the set, do not eat that. That is a prop.
translation.it: Se vedete del cibo sul set, non mangiatelo. È di scena.

translation.en: Now we have that out of the way.
Today, we're lensing a scene from a war pic.
translation.it: Oggi giriamo una scena di un film di guerra.

translation.en: -Lensing. -[woman] Seven were saved where the plane goes down,
translation.it: - "Giriamo." - Ne salvano sette dove precipita l'aereo,

translation.en: and a bunch of passengers flail around in the water and then die, okay?
translation.it: mentre gli altri si dimenano in acqua e poi muoiono. Ok?

translation.en: -[crowd clamoring] -All right, uh, you,
-and you... -[man] Thanks!
You, you and you...
you...
uh, you...
and...
-you. -[cymbal crashes]
[woman] Okay, thank you very much. That's it for today. See y'all tomorrow.
translation.it: Ok, grazie mille. Per oggi è tutto. Ci vediamo domani.

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Roswell. Beg your pardon, Jack Castello.
translation.it: Mi scusi, sig.ra Roswell. Sono Jack Castello e credo sarei perfetto per il suo film.

translation.en: I think I'd be great in your war picture.
translation.it: Sono Jack Castello e credo sarei perfetto per il suo film.

translation.en: The drowning scene? You see, I fought at Anzio.
translation.it: La scena dell'annegamento? Sa, ho combattuto ad Anzio.

translation.en: -Oh, you have training? -Sure, Fort Benning, Georgia.
translation.it: - Che formazione hai? - Fort Benning, Georgia.

translation.en: Mm, I mean acting training. -You got any of that? -Well, no.
Good-looking kid like you, you think you just gotta show up and poof,
translation.it: - Beh, no. - Hai un bel faccino e pensavi di venire qui e diventare subito una star?

translation.en: you're a movie star, huh? Well, that ain't how it works.
translation.it: e pensavi di venire qui e diventare subito una star? Non funziona così.

translation.en: Pretty face, but no training.
[chuckles] Kid, you're a dime a dozen.
[man] Look, first breaks are tough in this town.
translation.it: È difficile trovare opportunità in questa città.

translation.en: Don't beat yourself up.
No, no, no, no.
Already taken care of.
-What does he want? -Don't know. Maybe he thought you looked thirsty.
translation.it: - Che vuole? - Non so. Forse ti vedeva assetato.

translation.en: [clerk] Now, you're looking for a loan of about $20,000?
translation.it: Vorreste un prestito di circa 20.000 dollari?

translation.en: [woman] Yes, that's right. Just enough for a modest home.
translation.it: Esatto. Quanto basta per una casa modesta.

translation.en: [clerk] Swell, let's take a look at your application.
I see you're a veteran, Mr. Castello. Thank you for your service.
translation.it: Vedo che è un veterano, sig. Castello. Grazie per il suo servizio.

translation.en: And Mrs. Castello, you are a waitress.
Yes, and I intend to keep working until the baby arrives.
translation.it: Sì, e intendo lavorare fino all'arrivo del bambino.

translation.en: [clerk] So, you're expecting?
Well, congratulations.
And Mr. Castello, it says here you're a film actor. Any pictures I might know you from?
translation.it: Sig. Castello, qui c'è scritto che è un attore. L'ho vista in un film?

translation.en: Ah, probably not.
Uh, to me, it's not about the notoriety, it's about the craft.
translation.it: A me non importa la fama, ma il mestiere,

translation.en: It's about showing up to work every day, you know.
translation.it: presentarsi al lavoro tutti i giorni.

translation.en: -And for a super, that can mean-- -I'm sorry, a what?
translation.it: - E per un sopra... - Un cosa, scusi?

translation.en: Oh, a supernumerary. A supernumerary.
-It means "extra." -It means "background actor." That's the proper term.
translation.it: - Una comparsa. - "Attore di sfondo" è il termine esatto.

translation.en: In many ways, we contribute to the reality of the scene
translation.it: Contribuiamo in molti modi alla realtà della scena,

translation.en: even more so than the principal actors.
But I don't see any income here.
Uh, no, presently not, but, uh...
But hey! I've got a casting tomorrow,
and if they pick me, that's ten dollars in my pocket!
translation.it: Se mi scelgono, metto in tasca dieci dollari!

translation.en: Very well. Uh...
Unfortunately, Mr. and Mrs. Castello,
we would be unable to provide a loan of the size that you're seeking based on your current income.
translation.it: non possiamo concedervi un prestito del genere, col vostro reddito attuale.

translation.en: Listen, thank you for your time, sir.
One of those days, huh?
Bartender, two more, please.
-Why are you buying me drinks? -To thank you for your service.
translation.it: - Perché mi offre da bere? - Per ringraziarti per il tuo servizio.

translation.en: You served, didn't you? Where'd you fight?
translation.it: - Perché mi offre da bere? - Per ringraziarti per il tuo servizio. Dove hai combattuto?

translation.en: -Anzio. -Anzio! [chuckles]
Anzio was rough.
-Jack. -Nice to meet you.
I wanted to fight. Tried to enlist and everything, but they wouldn't take me.
translation.it: Volevo combattere. Provai ad arruolarmi, ma non mi presero.

translation.en: -Said my cock was too big. -[coughing]
Yeah, surprised me too. I mean, it's big.
translation.it: Sorprese anche me. Cioè, grosso è grosso.

translation.en: Twelve inches, soup to nuts, and not floppy either.
translation.it: Ben 30 centimetri dalla punta alle palle, e mai moscio.

translation.en: I get hard as a fucking rock.
Are you for real? What are you talking about?
translation.it: Fai sul serio? Ma che dici?

translation.en: -I got a very big dick. -[Jack] No, I...
translation.it: - Che ho un cazzo enorme. - No.

translation.en: I heard you when you said that. I'm wondering why. Why are you...
translation.it: Ho sentito, ma mi chiedo perché.

translation.en: coming up to a stranger in a bar, talking about how big your cock is?
translation.it: Perché andare da uno sconosciuto e dirgli quanto è grosso il tuo cazzo?

translation.en: -Because you asked me. -Did I? Does not sound like me.
translation.it: - Me l'hai chiesto. - Davvero? Non è da me.

translation.en: Look, all I'm saying is I know a hard-luck fella when I sees one.
translation.it: Dico solo che riconosco un tipo sfortunato quando ne vedo uno.

translation.en: I used to be right where you are.
I used to worry about my wife and kids... They're grown now.
translation.it: Mi preoccupavo di moglie e figli. Loro sono cresciuti, lei è morta.

translation.en: She's dead, God bless her. Good woman.
But I've been where you are, wondering what my life was gonna mean.
translation.it: Ma allora ero come te, e mi chiedevo che senso avesse la mia vita.

translation.en: -What do you want? -I run a service station.
And business is booming!
translation.it: E gli affari vanno a gonfie vele!

translation.en: I could use a good-looking fella like yourself pumping gas.
translation.it: Mi servirebbe un bel tipo come te, a fare benzina.

translation.en: Why do you need someone good-looking to pump gas?
translation.it: Perché ti serve un benzinaio bello?

translation.en: My gas station specializes in good-looking attendants.
translation.it: Il mio distributore è specializzato in bei benzinai.

translation.en: It's my corner of the market, it's why we do good business. This is Hollywood, kid!
translation.it: È la mia fetta di mercato, per questo andiamo bene. È Hollywood!

translation.en: It's what people want. It's why they left their cow towns where they grew up.
translation.it: La gente vuole questo. Per questo hanno lasciato le campagne.

translation.en: They don't want some fatso looking under their hood,
translation.it: Non vogliono essere serviti da un grassone

translation.en: just reeking of sweat, grease under their fingernails.
translation.it: che puzza di sudore e col grasso sotto le unghie.

translation.en: It's an intimate act, if you think about it,
translation.it: È un atto intimo, se ci pensi bene, e...

translation.en: and, get this...
translation.it: È un atto intimo, se ci pensi bene, e... guarda qua.

translation.en: They'll tip big for it.
This is for you.
Thanks.
What I offer is a vision of a new America.
translation.it: Io offro la visione di una nuova America.

translation.en: The America that you fought for.
You're very kind, but no.
Okay.
Citrus and Normandy, if you change your mind.
translation.it: Se cambi idea, mi trovi tra la Citrus e la Normandie.

translation.en: It's not our anniversary, is it?
They cut our electricity, Jack.
translation.it: Ci hanno staccato la luce, Jack.

translation.en: Well...
sure is romantic, baby, huh?
Don't bother. You already knocked me up.
translation.it: Non disturbarti. Mi hai già messa incinta.

translation.en: Cold wieners are on the table for you.
translation.it: In tavola ci sono le salsicce, fredde.

translation.en: [Ernie] That looks good.
Kid, I gotta tell you, you look fantastic.
translation.it: Ragazzo mio, devo dire che sei fantastico.

translation.en: Handsome, young, brimming with optimism.
And, oh, by the way, you're clean, right? No venereal disease?
translation.it: A proposito, sei sano? Nessuna malattia venerea?

translation.en: Okay, what is-- What do you mean? What are you talking about?
translation.it: Ma di che parli? - Perché lo chiedi? - Senti, questa città è fatta di sogni.

translation.en: Look, kid, this town is all about dreams, right?
translation.it: - Perché lo chiedi? - Senti, questa città è fatta di sogni.

translation.en: You know that.
And some of my customers don't just come here for gas.
translation.it: E alcuni clienti non vengono qui solo per la benzina.

translation.en: They have, uh, fantasies and desires.
And for them, it ain't enough to watch a fantasy up on the big screen.
translation.it: E a loro non basta guardare una loro fantasia sul grande schermo.

translation.en: They want it for themselves, and I provide that for them.
translation.it: La vogliono nella realtà, e io gliela fornisco.

translation.en: In a way, I'm no different than Louis B. Mayer, you know what I mean?
translation.it: In un certo senso, non sono diverso da Louis B. Mayer, capisci?

translation.en: No, Ernie, I have no idea what you mean.
You see, some of them say a secret code word.
translation.it: Alcune dicono una parola in codice segreta.

translation.en: You get in the car with them. Have a drink maybe, or sometimes...
translation.it: Sali in macchina con loro, bevete qualcosa e, a volte...

translation.en: sometimes you have to service 'em.
You gotta... you gotta be kidding me.
translation.it: - Mi prendi in giro? - Che c'è?

translation.en: What? You don't like women?
Sure, I like women, that's why I married one.
[Ernie] All right, so let me ask you...
translation.it: Ok, lascia che ti chieda una cosa.

translation.en: -You never cheated on her? -No.
Okay, I'm going to ask you again.
You never cheated on her?
[woman moaning] Oh, Jack.
No, uh... One time. One time, I was... I was on leave, I was drunk.
translation.it: No... Una volta sola. Ero in licenza ed ero ubriaco.

translation.en: Then you're good! First time's always the hardest, and you got that outta the way.
translation.it: Allora sei a posto! La prima volta è sempre la più difficile.

translation.en: You're gonna be great.
Oh, here's one right here.
Jack, today is your lucky day.
translation.it: Jack, oggi è il tuo giorno fortunato.

translation.en: -[bell dings] -This one's special, take it from me.
translation.it: È una cliente speciale, te l'assicuro.

translation.en: No, no, no. Ernie, I'm not doing this.
I came here to be in pictures, I'm gonna be a movie star.
translation.it: Sono venuto qui per diventare una star del cinema.

translation.en: This, this is not for me. I-- I appreciate...
translation.it: Questo non fa per me. Apprezzo che tu...

translation.en: Look, you hired me to pump gas, I'll pump gas.
translation.it: Mi hai assunto per fare benzina, ed è quel che farò.

translation.en: This, forget it. So long.
[Ernie] All right, but you just missed out on 100 bucks.
translation.it: Va bene, ma hai perso 100 dollari.

translation.en: My customers pay twice that,
translation.it: I miei clienti pagano il doppio,

translation.en: and you and me,
we split it, 50-50.
So, are you gonna take it?
Or am I giving it to one of the other guys?
translation.it: O la do a uno degli altri?

translation.en: Fuck me.
[Ernie] Attaboy!
You're gonna do great.
-Shut up. -[Ernie] Let me know how it goes.
translation.it: - Andrai alla grande. - Sta' zitto. Fammi sapere come va.

translation.en: Fill 'er up?
I wanna go to Dreamland.
Okay.
You'll do nicely.
Welcome.
Where are we going?
I got us a room. My daughter's at home.
translation.it: Ho preso una camera. Mia figlia è a casa.

translation.en: You aren't nervous about being recognized?
That's the fun of it.
So, how long have you been here?
Oh, you-- you mean in Los Angeles?
Just a couple of months. I'm from Missouri originally.
translation.it: Solo un paio di mesi. Sono originario del Missouri.

translation.en: Let me guess...
you came here to be a movie star.
translation.it: Sei qui per diventare una star del cinema.

translation.en: How did you know?
Takes one to know one.
I was in pictures. Silent films.
Good ones, too.
But then came the talkies.
I had one screen test,
and they told me there wasn't a place in talkies for ethnics.
translation.it: e mi dissero che nei film sonori non c'era posto per gli stranieri.

translation.en: A little "Jewey" was the word they used.
I politely informed them that Jews built this town and was shown the door.
translation.it: Li informai che gli ebrei hanno costruito questa città e mi cacciarono.

translation.en: Nobody thought a Jewish girl could be a movie star.
translation.it: Nessuno pensava che un'ebrea potesse essere una star del cinema.

translation.en: Nobody thought they were pretty.
So, I went to a bar and got drunk,
translation.it: Così andai in un locale a ubriacarmi

translation.en: met a low-level executive who said he was about to get a promotion.
translation.it: e incontrai un dirigente minore vicino a una promozione.

translation.en: He said the only thing I could hope for was to be a development girl.
translation.it: Disse che potevo solo sperare di essere un'assistente.

translation.en: A goddamn script reader.
I said, "Fuck this town, I'm done."
translation.it: Dissi: "Vaffanculo, ho chiuso con questa città".

translation.en: He knocked me up, we got married, and I've been punishing him ever since.
translation.it: Mi mise incinta, ci sposammo e lo punisco da allora.

translation.en: Oh, he did get that promotion, though.
Now he's the star, not this Jew.
translation.it: Ora è lui la star, non questa giudea.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, Jack?
Why do you want to be a movie star?
translation.it: Perché vuoi diventare una star del cinema?

translation.en: You want an honest answer?
Well, we're about to get naked and fuck each other, so why not?
translation.it: Stiamo per scopare, quindi perché no?

translation.en: Well, um, if I'm being honest...
all my life, folks thought I was dumb.
My mom and dad, my school teachers-- Oh, thank you.
translation.it: I miei genitori, gli insegnanti... Oh, grazie.

translation.en: All telling me I was lucky I was good-looking.
translation.it: Dicevano sempre che ero fortunato a essere bello.

translation.en: And I knew what they meant,
that that was all I had going for me.
I just want to do something big, you know?
translation.it: Voglio solo fare qualcosa di grande.

translation.en: Prove to them that I can be somebody in this world.
Do something that matters. [chuckling] So movies...
translation.it: - E fare qualcosa d'importante. - E credi che i film...

translation.en: you think they matter?
You kidding?
I know they do.
When you're walking through your life, it's easy to feel like you're going through the motions, right?
translation.it: È facile vedere la vita come una cosa puramente meccanica.

translation.en: Like it doesn't really mean anything.
But when I was a kid...
I grew up on a farm in Missouri, so we had to drive a half hour to get to the picture show.
translation.it: vivevo in una fattoria nel Missouri, a mezz'ora d'auto dal primo cinematografo.

translation.en: And when I looked up at that enormous screen,
translation.it: E quando guardai quello schermo enorme,

translation.en: I suddenly knew what life was supposed to feel like,
translation.it: all'improvviso capii... come doveva essere la vita,

translation.en: what being alive was supposed to mean.
It was like there was something somewhere out there...
translation.it: Era come se ci fosse qualcosa, da qualche parte là fuori,

translation.en: waiting for me.
That's what being alive is supposed to mean.
I held my first hand at a movie theater, I-- I had my first kiss at a movie theater, I...
translation.it: Ho tenuto la mia prima mano e dato il mio primo bacio al cinema.

translation.en: I don't know.
What I do know is this: every time I leave the picture show, I feel better than I did walking in.
translation.it: Ma so che ogni volta che esco dal cinema mi sento meglio di quando sono entrato.

translation.en: I never thought about it like that.
Can I ask you a question?
Only if you come and sit by me.
translation.it: Solo se ti siedi accanto a me.

translation.en: I'm paying for company.
Why are you here?
I mean, doing this with me. [chuckles]
translation.it: Cioè, a fare questa cosa con me.

translation.en: You got a husband you don't like?
Truth is, I don't entirely know how I'd get out of it.
translation.it: La verità è che non so come potrei uscirne.

translation.en: I've gotten used to being rich, being taken care of.
translation.it: Mi sono abituata a essere ricca e mantenuta,

translation.en: But I know that he can barely bring himself to touch me anymore.
translation.it: ma so che, ormai, riesce a malapena a toccarmi.

translation.en: So what's a girl to do?
Bridge?
Parcheesi?
I tried sleeping with the help, but that's no good.
translation.it: Ho provato a farmi i domestici, ma non va.

translation.en: This is much easier.
Less complicated.
You know, coming to a public place like this, it's, uh...
translation.it: Venendo in un posto pubblico come questo,

translation.en: it's kinda like you're asking to be caught.
translation.it: sembra che tu voglia farti beccare.

translation.en: Maybe I am.
Maybe I want to make my husband jealous.
Maybe I want him to know...
that someone else desires me.
And that I'm still alive...
with so much more to give.
translation.it: e ho ancora molto da dare.

translation.en: You're married.
Yeah, I am.
Do you feel guilty?
I gotta provide.
Then provide.
Yeah.
Listen...
How exactly do we, uh, get started?
Well, first you take your shoes off.
translation.it: Beh, prima ti togli le scarpe.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Got it.
My...
aren't I a lucky gal?
Listen, before we--
Can I ask you a question?
Just 'cause you've been through it.
You think I got what it takes? I mean, to make it in this town?
translation.it: Credi che abbia quel che serve, per farcela in questa città?

translation.en: Who can say?
But what I do know, Jack,
is you have a strong light inside you.
translation.it: è che hai una forte luce dentro di te.

translation.en: Shine that light on me.
Make me feel like I matter.
Even if it's a lie.
-Okay. -[chuckles]
Sammy, nice work. Ricky Boy, that's for you.
translation.it: Bel lavoro, Sammy. Ricky Boy, questo è per te.

translation.en: Bad Man Bruce, -Rough Ronny. -[Ronny] Thank you.
translation.it: - Bruce il Bruto. Ronny il Rozzo. - Grazie.

translation.en: Hey, there, champ! I heard it went great!
translation.it: Ehi, campione! Ho sentito che è andata benissimo! E questo è...

translation.en: And here's this for your trouble.
translation.it: Ho sentito che è andata benissimo! E questo è... per il disturbo.

translation.en: Not too bad, right?
Avis is a real pistol, ain't she? Ten-year regular of yours truly.
translation.it: Avis è una vera bomba, eh? Una cliente fedele da dieci anni!

translation.en: No, it was, uh...
She was kind.
It was actually all right.
Good. In that case, I got another one for you. Just a quickie in the shed behind the station. Won't take you ten minutes.
translation.it: Allora si rifà. Sveltina nella roulotte qui dietro, neanche dieci minuti.

translation.en: -Right now? -Right now!
All yours, Kemosabe.
Well, hello there.
Ernie, there's been a mistake. [stammers] There's some guy in there.
translation.it: Ernie, c'è stato un errore. C'è un tizio, lì dentro.

translation.en: That's not just "some guy."
That's Cole Porter. He's a living legend.
translation.it: Quello è Cole Porter, una leggenda vivente.

translation.en: The Gay Divorcee, Anything Goes...
Yesterday I heard you humming "Don't Fence Me In."
translation.it: Anything Goes. Ieri canticchiavi "Don't Fence Me In".

translation.en: That's the son of a bitch who wrote it!
So?
So give the guy two minutes of your time. He's real polite about it.
translation.it: Dagli due minuti del tuo tempo. È molto educato.

translation.en: -Don't keep him waiting! -Are you...
Are you telling me you expect me to...
Forget it! Forget it, Ernie, I'm not doing that!
I'm not-- It's not me. It's not me!
I gotta draw the line somewhere, all right? I'm not doing it!
translation.it: C'è un limite anche per me. Non lo farò!

translation.en: -End of story. -Okay.
I see how it goes.
translation.it: Ho capito. Non puoi stabilire i termini del tuo lavoro qui.

translation.en: You don't get to set the terms of your employment here, Jack, I do!
translation.it: Ho capito. Non puoi stabilire i termini del tuo lavoro qui. Lo faccio io!

translation.en: And I'm running low on guys this month and I got a bad cough I can't shake.
translation.it: Questo mese sono a corto di ragazzi e ho una brutta tosse.

translation.en: I'm not sitting at some shitty smokey bar to headhunt.
translation.it: Non me ne starò in un bar di merda a reclutare gente.

translation.en: So if you can't walk into a shed and lend a helping hand
translation.it: Quindi, se non puoi dare una mano al tesoro nazionale Cole Porter,

translation.en: to national treasure Cole Porter, you better find me somebody who can.
translation.it: Quindi, se non puoi dare una mano al tesoro nazionale Cole Porter, trovami qualcuno che possa.

translation.en: Otherwise, no money,
and you can get the fuck out of here!
That suits me fine.
I quit.
Yeah, well, good luck then, kid!
I wanted to be a movie star too, you know!
translation.it: Anch'io volevo diventare una star del cinema, sai?

translation.en: Sweetheart.
What are you doing here?
Doctor's appointment? Jeez, yeah. Um...
Tell Rudy I'm taking my break.
translation.it: Di' a Rudy che vado in pausa.

translation.en: [man] You two own your own home?
[Henrietta] No, we're just renting at the moment.
translation.it: OSTETRICO - No, per ora siamo in affitto. - La cervice è a posto.

translation.en: Cervix feels just right.
translation.it: - No, per ora siamo in affitto. - La cervice è a posto.

translation.en: Well, it's probably just as well,
because you know what they say,
having a kid is just as expensive as having a mortgage.
translation.it: avere un figlio è costoso quanto avere un mutuo.

translation.en: All right, let's see if we can hear a heartbeat.
translation.it: Bene. Vediamo se riusciamo a sentire il battito.

translation.en: Now, just relax.
Starting on the nursery yet?
No, we're in an efficiency so there really isn't room for a separate nursery.
translation.it: No. Viviamo in un monolocale, non c'è spazio.

translation.en: So you're having a baby and looking for a new apartment?
translation.it: Quindi state per avere un bambino e cercate un nuovo appartamento?

translation.en: Sheesh, that's no fun.
Are you finding a heartbeat, or...
[doctor] They've also raised the price on formula, so keep that in mind.
translation.it: È anche aumentato il prezzo del latte. Tenetelo a mente.

translation.en: What?
Twins.
-[Henrietta] What? -What?
-Yep. Two heartbeats. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.it: - Sì. Ci sono due battiti. - Ma scherziamo?

translation.en: -[loud thud] -Jack!
-Hiya, Jack. -Flo.
[chuckles] How's Hollywood treating you? Oh, you know, I'm living the dream.
translation.it: - A Hollywood come va? - Un vero sogno.

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -Listen, I got a favor to ask you.
I'm a little short on cash, but I could really use a costume.
translation.it: Sono un po' a corto di soldi, ma mi servirebbe un costume.

translation.en: What kind of costume?
-One, please. -[man] Um...
Uh, you don't have to pay, Officer. You can just go right in.
translation.it: Non deve pagare, agente. Può entrare.

translation.en: Damn right, I don't have to pay.
How are you today?
I'm fine, how are you?
-I'm well. -Yeah?
You got any money, honey?
Sure do.
I bet you do.
Get out of here.
Shit!
You're coming with me.
Shit.
Walk.
-Are you going to put me in jail? -Shut up. Keep walking.
translation.it: - Mi sbatterà in galera? - Zitto e cammina.

translation.en: -Got a squad car somewhere, or-- -I said can it!
translation.it: - Ha una volante da qualche parte o... - Taci!

translation.en: -We're going right around the corner. -Schwab's is around the corner.
translation.it: - Andiamo dietro l'angolo. - Ma lì c'è Schwab.

translation.en: What, you don't like Schwab's?
What?
Could you just do me a favor and clue me in here?
translation.it: Mi darebbe un indizio, per favore?

translation.en: Am I getting arrested?
Listen, you're gonna get honest with me real fast or I'm taking you downtown to the lock-up.
translation.it: Senti, o sei onesto con me o ti porto in centrale e ti sbatto dentro.

translation.en: Hey, Jack, it's ready.
Let's go.
Hey, Jack, what's with the get-up?
Nothing. It's just my uniform.
I wear it when I'm on duty.
translation.it: La indosso quando sono in servizio.

translation.en: I'll have a cup of coffee. My friend here will have a Shirley Temple.
translation.it: Io prendo un caffè e il mio amico uno Shirley Temple.

translation.en: That's awfully rude, don't you think?
Explain yourself.
-What do you want me to say? -Start from the beginning, why don't you?
translation.it: - Cosa vuole che dica? - Perché non parti dall'inizio?

translation.en: Okay.
I moved to LA after I got out of the service.
translation.it: Mi sono trasferito a Los Angeles dopo il congedo.

translation.en: I wanted to be a writer.
Still do.
I wrote a script, you know?
Screenplay about Peg Entwistle,
a girl who jumped off the Hollywood sign because the town wouldn't accept her.
translation.it: che si gettò dall'insegna di Hollywood perché la città non la accettava.

translation.en: I know the feeling, so I wrote about it.
translation.it: Conosco la sensazione. Per questo... l'ho scritta.

translation.en: Sold my script, too.
But a hundred bucks...
ain't much,
and a studio ain't gonna put a black man under contract.
translation.it: e uno studio non farà un contratto a un nero.

translation.en: I got...
Can I smoke?
Yeah, go ahead.
Thank you.
You need money?
I get a dollar a script
down at the Lincoln Theater, writing vaudeville sketches.
translation.it: per ogni scenetta che scrivo al Lincoln Theatre.

translation.en: But that's once a week,
translation.it: Ma è una volta alla settimana, quindi...

translation.en: so the way I see it, gotta turn these tricks.
translation.it: Ma è una volta alla settimana, quindi... per come la vedo io, mi tocca fare questi servizietti.

translation.en: And I can't go cruise Pershing Square or the farmer's market, okay?
translation.it: E non posso andare a uomini a Pershing Square o al mercato contadino.

translation.en: Cops will arrest me just for loitering, so I turn my tricks up at Joe's place.
translation.it: Mi arresterebbero per vagabondaggio, quindi faccio i servizietti da Joe.

translation.en: Beats washing dishes,
translation.it: Sempre meglio che lavare i piatti.

translation.en: and I like doing it.
Why not get paid for something that feels good that you was gonna do anyways?
translation.it: Perché non farsi pagare per qualcosa di bello che avresti fatto comunque?

translation.en: I'm discerning.
-My tricks gotta be good-looking, clean-- -So, you're a gigolo.
translation.it: I miei clienti devono essere belli, - puliti... - Sei un gigolò?

translation.en: I'm a writer.
Call it whatever you want.
I ain't ashamed.
I know who I am.
Now, Miss Shirley here is delicious.
What if I told you I could offer you an opportunity?
translation.it: E se ti dicessi che posso darti l'opportunità

translation.en: A job, doing what you're doing, but safer.
translation.it: di fare quello che fai già, ma in modo più sicuro?

translation.en: What the hell kind of cop are you?
I know a fella who owns a gas station.
translation.it: Conosco un tizio che ha un distributore.

translation.en: You pump gas, some customers you do a little more, you know what I'm saying.
translation.it: Devi fare benzina e, ad alcuni clienti, qualcosa in più. Sai cosa intendo.

translation.en: Pay is good, very good. More than what you're charging.
translation.it: La paga è molto buona, più di quanto prendi ora.

translation.en: And if you wanted to, you could just do guys.
translation.it: E se lo volessi, potresti farti solo i maschi.

translation.en: You ain't no real cop.
Also, I do wanna ask you. I gotta ask you...
Pall Malls.
Could you make it with a woman if you had to?
translation.it: Lo faresti con una donna, se necessario?

translation.en: Yeah.
Sure, I can fake it. Ain't that what most fellas do with their wives anyways?
translation.it: Posso fingere. Non è quello che fanno quasi tutti con le mogli?

translation.en: -He's paying for it. -Okay.
I'm gonna take you to meet my friend Ernie.
translation.it: Ti presenterò il mio amico Ernie.

translation.en: First, you're right, I'm not a cop.
translation.it: E hai ragione, non sono uno sbirro.

translation.en: I'm an actor.
But, until that moment just then,
you thought I was a cop, didn't you?
What I mean is, you would cast me as a cop...
translation.it: Insomma, mi avresti scritturato come poliziotto, vero?

translation.en: Sweet beans in a basket.
He'll do the guy stuff? Ask him.
If the price is right.
-50-50. -[scoffs] I'm worth more than that, 60-40.
translation.it: Il 50%. Valgo di più. Facciamo 60 e 40.

translation.en: I like this kid. Enterprising.
Okay, deal.
-Archie Coleman. -You're gonna do a lot of business, kid.
translation.it: - Archie Coleman. - Farai un sacco di affari.

translation.en: I can tell just by looking at you.
What's the password again?
translation.it: Qual è la parola in codice?

translation.en: [Ernie] He's all yours, go get him.
I knew you'd be back.
They always come back.
How's it going?
Can I help you?
Uh, yeah, I want to go to Wonderland.
The street?
Oh, that's up there on Laurel Canyon.
[scoffs] You mean Dreamland?
Yeah. Dreamland.
Okay.
What can I do for you?
Uh, I don't know. Are there-- are there options here, or...
translation.it: Non lo so. Ci sono più opzioni?

translation.en: You're not interested in a black man?
No, I'm just a little nervous.
translation.it: No, sono solo un po' agitato.

translation.en: What's your name?
Archie.
This your place?
Yeah.
I'm renting month-to-month. I know it ain't much, but it's all I can afford right now.
translation.it: La affitto di mese in mese. Non è molto, ma per ora non posso permettermi altro.

translation.en: What do you want?
-What do you mean? -I mean what do you want to do...
translation.it: - In che senso? - Cosa vuoi fare...

translation.en: to me?
Or what do you want me to do to you?
translation.it: O cosa vuoi che ti faccia io?

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, you're, uh...
I like how straightforward you are.
[chuckles] Yeah.
Well, I just wanna make sure you get your money's worth, Mr. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.it: Voglio solo assicurarmi di valere i suoi soldi, sig. Roy Fitzgerald.

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
Where are you from?
Illinois. Little town called Winnetka.
Fitzgerald's my stepdad, Scherer's my real dad's name.
translation.it: Fitzgerald è il mio patrigno. Il cognome di mio padre è Scherer.

translation.en: I came out here to reconnect with him, but...
translation.it: Sono venuto qui per riavvicinarmi a lui,

translation.en: it didn't really wash.
What about you? Where are you from?
Where am I from?
So, what's a good-looking guy like yourself doing paying for affection?
translation.it: Allora, perché un bel ragazzo come te paga per avere amore?

translation.en: Why not just go to those joints on Main Street?
translation.it: Perché non vai in quei locali su Main Street?

translation.en: Harold to the 1-2-3... Cookie, you're making me nervous. [chuckles]
translation.it: Tipo Harold's, o all'1-2-3. Cucciolo, mi innervosisci.

translation.en: Relax.
I'll take good care of you.
Uh, I went down there once, but...
I-- I saw somebody I thought I recognized.
translation.it: credevo di aver riconosciuto una persona.

translation.en: A casting director.
So I pretended like I was in the wrong place and-- and walked out.
translation.it: Così finsi di aver sbagliato posto e me ne andai.

translation.en: I'm gonna be an actor, see? So...
I-- I can't have anybody thinking I'm...
translation.it: non posso far credere a nessuno...

translation.en: that way.
[Archie] I'm lucky I'm not trying to be in front of the camera.
translation.it: Sono fortunato a non essere davanti alla cinepresa.

translation.en: That just wouldn't work for somebody like me.
translation.it: Non funzionerebbe, per uno come me.

translation.en: -That's why I'm a writer. -A writer? You don't say.
translation.it: - Ma sono uno scrittore. - Non mi dire!

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I got a studio looking at one of my scripts.
translation.it: Sì, beh... Uno studio ha una mia sceneggiatura.

translation.en: It could be a first, you know? Major studio, black writer.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere la prima volta. Una major con uno sceneggiatore nero.

translation.en: I mean, there's only been two or three black screenwriters before,
translation.it: Ci sono stati solo due o tre sceneggiatori neri prima:

translation.en: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes, but those were race pictures, you know?
translation.it: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes, ma erano film solo per afro-americani.

translation.en: Stories about black folk.
It's like you can't even run those pictures in parts of this country.
translation.it: E non si possono proiettare, in certe zone del Paese.

translation.en: But, you see, my script’s about a white gal, so...
translation.it: Ma la mia sceneggiatura è su una ragazza bianca, quindi...

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe you could star in it, Roy.
translation.it: Chissà, magari ci reciterai tu, Roy.

translation.en: Could you imagine something like that?
-That would be-- -A dream.
Yeah.
Yeah.
In Dreamland.
And if it comes true?
When it comes...
true.
We'd look back and say the two of us meeting was
translation.it: Ci guarderemo indietro e diremo che il nostro incontro

translation.en: that Hollywood dream starting to come true.
translation.it: era l'inizio del sogno di Hollywood.

translation.en: There you go, Jack.
Buffalo Billy, Slippery Sammy, Rabid Ronny,
translation.it: Buffalo Billy, Sammy lo Scivoloso, Ronny il Rabbioso,

translation.en: Goody Two-Shoes Glen, and Arch... Welcome to the family.
translation.it: Glen il Galante e Arch. Benvenuto tra noi.

translation.en: Ernie, what's the matter? You all right?
[clears throat] It's nothing. It's nothing.
This black walnut blooms this time of year.
Let's make it another great week, fellas! -[workers] Yes, sir! -Go get 'em. All right.
translation.it: Che sia un'altra fantastica settimana! Dateci dentro. Forza.

translation.en: -What'll it be? -Dreamland.
-Where to? -Dreamland.
-Where to for you? -Dreamland.
Hmm, you are really good at that, you know?
So is this what you do, full time?
translation.it: Dimmi, lo fai a tempo pieno?

translation.en: No, uh, just to make ends meet.
translation.it: No, solo per sbarcare il lunario.

translation.en: I'm an actor.
Really?
I'm in casting.
[Jack] Excuse me, sorry.
Pardon me.
Jack! I ain't seen you in a while, Bubby! I thought you threw in the towel.
translation.it: Jack! Non ti vedo da un po'! Pensavo avessi gettato la spugna.

translation.en: -No, still pounding the pavement. -Sure, sure. That's great.
translation.it: - No, ancora non la getto. - Fantastico.

translation.en: Me? I've been working every day this week on a Sidney Lanfield picture.
translation.it: Io ho lavorato tutta la settimana a un film di Sidney Lanfield.

translation.en: -Lot of frame wipes. Know what that is? -Sure.
translation.it: - Un sacco di raccordi. Sai cosa sono? - Certo.

translation.en: I walk right next to the camera, real close, and the director uses that to cut the scene together.
translation.it: Cammino vicinissimo alla cinepresa e il regista lo usa per montare la scena.

translation.en: Practically editing this goddamn thing. Shh, shh, here she comes!
translation.it: Praticamente sto montando io 'sto film. Arriva.

translation.en: Okay.
-I need three warm bodies. -[crowd clamoring]
You, you and... you.
That's it. See the rest of youse tomorrow.
translation.it: Ecco fatto. Con voialtri ci vediamo domani.

translation.en: Wanna grab a bite to eat? My treat.
[Jack] No, I think I'm gonna stick around. What are you talking about?
translation.it: - No, credo che mi tratterrò un po'. - Di che parli?

translation.en: Get in here.
What the hell's going on?
Oh, I, uh, I got a walk-on role in a Cecil B. DeMille picture. Might get a line!
translation.it: Ho un ruolo in un film di Cecil B. DeMille e potrei avere una battuta!

translation.en: Hey, something's gonna happen for you one of these days, Lou, I know it!
translation.it: Uno di questi giorni capiterà anche a te. Ne sono certo!

translation.en: How are you?
[exhales] I love this town.
Hello, sweetheart.
What are you doing?
Nothing, just cooking dinner for my wife.
translation.it: Niente, preparo la cena a mia moglie.

translation.en: Hungry?
No, suspicious.
translation.it: No, c'è qualcosa che non torna.

translation.en: What did you do?
Uh, nothing, nothing. Just come here. Sit down.
We're celebrating.
Celebrating what?
You quitting your job.
-What? I like working at Schwab's! -I can't have you on your feet all day.
translation.it: - Ma mi piace lavorare da Schwab! - Non puoi stare in piedi tutto il giorno.

translation.en: You're three months along, I don't want you working anymore, all right?
translation.it: Sei di tre mesi. Non voglio più vederti lavorare, ok?

translation.en: Not another word about it.
Let's eat.
Just eat!
my...
-God. -That's $500.
How-- How did you get this?
I've been doing good work at the gas station.
Rent's already paid, gas and electric too.
translation.it: Ho già pagato affitto, gas e luce.

translation.en: Now, that ain't for spending, all right?
That's a down-payment... on a house.
translation.it: Sono un acconto. Per una casa.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I-- I don't...
I thought that's what you wanted.
[laughing] It is, I just can't believe it!
translation.it: Sì, solo che non riesco a crederci!

translation.en: Oh, my God!
Thank you! Thank you.
Anything for you. Anything for my family.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa per te e per la mia famiglia.

translation.en: What does that mean, "sexually ambidextrous"?
That means that my man Stan here likes the cat and the kitty.
translation.it: Significa che al mio amico Stan piacciono sia l'uccello che la micia.

translation.en: Huh, no fooling?
Well, welcome aboard, Stan.
-[bell dings] -Thanks.
All yours, Jack.
-Fill 'er up? -Dreamland.
-Hello. -How are you?
-Better now, thank you. -Glad to hear it.
translation.it: - Ora meglio, grazie. - Mi fa piacere.

translation.en: Oh, no, uh, I don't touch the money. You pay Ernie and Ernie pays me.
translation.it: Non prendo io i soldi. Tu paghi Ernie e poi lui paga me.

translation.en: Well, what about a tip?
translation.it: Che ne dici di una mancia?

translation.en: Well, you can give it to me after, if you're satisfied.
translation.it: Puoi darmela dopo, se sarai soddisfatta.

translation.en: Well, wouldn't this ensure that I'm satisfied?
Okay, thanks.
-You're under arrest. -What?
translation.it: Sei in arresto. - Cosa? - L'ho preso!

translation.en: Got him!
Wait a minute, what is it? Whoa, buddy, buddy, what is this?
translation.it: Aspetta, che significa? Ehi, amico, che succede? Aspetta!

translation.en: -Wait a minute, wait! -[officer] Shut up!
translation.it: Aspetta, che significa? Ehi, amico, che succede? Aspetta! Zitto!

translation.en: You're under arrest for solicitation and lewd conduct
translation.it: Sei in arresto per adescamento e condotta oscena

translation.en: pursuant to California Penal Code, section 647-B.
translation.it: ai sensi del Codice Penale della California, sezione 647-B.
